1.Title: Fire!
1.Description: The equipper gains 1 Charge stack every 3s, stacking up to 6 times. When launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, consumes all Charge stacks and each stack consumed increases the skill's Daze inflicted by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>.
